content.text:
# 2011 Best of Nollywood Awards

The 3rd Best Of Nollywood Awards were held on Friday November 11, 2011 at the Lagoon Restaurant, Lagos. Top musical artist like JJC, W4, Capital F.E.M.I & Adol performed during the event.
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Best Lead Actress in an English Movie
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Best supporting Actress in an English Movie
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Nse Ikpe Etim (Mr. and Mrs.)'
* Omotola Jalade Ekeinde (A Private Storm)
* Genevieve Nnaji (The Mirror Boy)
* Omoni Oboli (Anchor Baby)
* Uche Jombo (Damage)
| valign="top" |
* 'Susan Peters (Bursting Out)'
* Ufuoma Ejenobor (Private Storm)
* Chelsea Eze (Two Brides and a Baby)
* Chika Ike (Criminal Mind)
* Queen Nwokoye (Cry of a Widow)
|-

|-
